title: Photos: Scenes from the biggest snowstorm to hit Massachusetts in years
author: Jack Pickell
bullets: Weather The largest snowstorm in years is sweeping across Massachusetts, and some areas could see snow totals of two feet or more.
A snowboarder does a jump in Boston Common during the snowstorm on Sunday Finn Gomez for the Boston Globe ShareSend this article to your social connections.
The largest snowstorm in years is sweeping across Massachusetts, and before the storm is done, some areas could see snow totals of two feet or more.

title: 2 facing assault charges after abuse reported at Mass. daycare, police say
author: Carson Lyle
bullets: Local News Anthony Barron, 27, Caleigh Kent, 25, are facing multiple assault and battery charges, among other charges.
Two Mass.
daycare employees were arraigned on Friday in connection to a child abuse investigation, Medway police said.
